me.dumfing.menus

Class MenuBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.dumfing.gdxtools.MenuObject
      • me.dumfing.menus.MenuBox

  • public class MenuBox
extends MenuObject
    MenuBox.java
    Aaron Li
    Works like a menu but has the ability to be added to a menu to be drawn and can move around will have it's own sprites, textboxes, buttons, etc. Won't have animated image backgrounds Can also have MenuBoxes on it (though this is still testing)
